TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXpsFixedDocumentReader implements class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider

Docs.summary: Defines methods for reading the parts of a and also for limited types of writing to the document.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to obtain a reference to an object that implements this interface.
[!code-cs[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsReadWriteSign/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/xpsreadwritesign/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]
The following example shows how to use an IXpsFixedDocumentReader to obtain an IXpsFixedDocumentReader collection in order to access each page in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
[!code-vb[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/documentstructure/window1.xaml.vb#docstrucfixeddoc)] [!code-cs[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/DocumentStructure/Window1.xaml.cs#docstrucfixeddoc)]

Docs.summary: Flushes the package <xref:System.IO.Stream> and also commits an to the package.
Gets the zero-based position of the document in the .
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the document location in the sequence.

Docs.summary: Gets the part, if one exists, of the .
Docs.value: An that represents the element, if one exists, and its child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document does not need to have a Document Structure part.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of readers, one reader for each page in the .
Docs.value: A collection of fixed page readers, one reader for each page in the .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the FixedPages property to obtain an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> collection in order to access the individual pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.

Docs.summary: Gets a reader for the with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
Gets the , if one exists, that is associated with the .
Docs.value: A that contains the default printing options for the document; or if no print ticket exists for the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of all the signature definitions that are associated with the .
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of signature definitions, typically one for every person who signed or will sign the document.

Docs.summary: Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the .

Docs.value: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document.
